post:
We proudly pounce that RouterHosting now providing Virtual Dedicated Servers, Now you can %50 off on first month for a limited time.


All nodes are equipped with 2 x Quad Core CPUs to 4 x Quad Core CPUs, 24-48GB DDR3 RAM and RAID10 arrays. All resources are dedicated and each VPS comes with VPS Management Panel.


What's include with all our service plans:
- Control Panel to manage the VPS
- 15-days money back guarantee
- Semi-Managed support - We try our best to help where we can
- 1Gbps connection
- Get more discounts on pre-payments

Available Windows Versions:
- Windows Server 2003 Enterprise Edition x86 (32bit)
- Windows Server 2003 Enterprise Edition x64 (64bit)
- Windows Server 2008 Enterprise Edition x86 (32bit)
- Windows Server 2008 Enterprise Edition x64 (64bit)
- Windows Server 2008 R2 Datacenter Edition x64 (64bit)

Web Based VPS Management Panel:
- Hard Reboot / Soft Reboot
- View CPU Utilization / Memory Utilization / Disk space Allocation
- Pause / Resume
- Turn on / Turn off
